text:
Hello, it’s Ro! And today, I was on set
filming a web series with TGS, it’s...

I’m so excited! I think it’s gonna start
airing at the beginning of next month,

so I can’t really talk about it, but I,
eeee! But I want to.

But tonight, I’m gonna watch Game of Thrones,
I love that TV show, and we

get together with The Warp Zone house and
it’s kind of like our Sunday thing.

Or it’s turning into our Sunday thing and
I’m pretty excited about it.
And I thought, I’m gonna make some pizzas,
I’m gonna make some game of thrones pizzas!

I bought 4 of these, they are the non-frozen,
ready to bake pizzas and then I’m

just going to decorate them. I bought a lot
of things to decorate with,
let me show you!

I cut up some fresh ham, pepperoni slices,
chicken, and a ton of olives!
I kind of went crazy, this might be too many.

And, barbecue sauce. This is super funny,
I’m going to decorate it like a cake,

I’m going to put barbecue sauce in this
bag, like I usually do the frosting.
Oh whoa, that was almost a disaster!
That’s lovely, sound.
We might need more, we’ll see.

I’m gonna cut the corner, gonna make my
outline.
Yummy!

Now I’m gonna put the ham on! I’m just
gonna line it, kinda all the way around!

Now we’re gonna put on the chicken! This
is gonna be the wolf!

This is the little wolf’s nose, it may not
look like it right now, but it will,
it will get there.

Got my barbecue sauce bag again
and
now I’m gonna try to draw a wolf!
Yay! Maybe, I’ll make him an eyeball now!
Oh yeah! He’s got a big eyeball!
Boom! House Stark

Now I’m gonna make House Baratheon, out
of olives! I’m gonna make a deer!
Kitty, you want some pizza? Mew, mew?
You want some pizza? Yeah?

He’s just excited because I dropped some
chicken from, uh, House Stark.
So, he’s hanging out just in case!

Gonna see if there’s any other nummies that
fall on the ground!
Oh yeah! Aren’t you kitty?
Just take big pinches, and put it on here.

We’re gonna make a border, and then a fancy
deer in the middle, minus the fancy part.

We have got baby momma drama going on upstairs,
our neighbors are arguing
about baby momma drama.

And it’s really funny, because if you stand
here in the kitchen you can hear.

Through that vent right there, you can hear
every word.
Shh, wait, wait, listen.

They’ve been yelling like that for over
45 minutes.

I don’t even have to watch TV, I’ve got
my own Maury upstairs!

Now for the deer part, we’re gonna chop
it up really, really small, cut all these

little olives like, like little baby teeny
chunks. Because it’s easier to,
um, make shapes.
Boom! House Baratheon!

Now I’m gonna make my favorite house pizza,
House Targaryen, the dragon!

It’s gonna be pepperoni and olives! And
first we’re gonna coat it with pepperoni,

covered in pepperonis, and then we’re gonna
put olives on top.

And it’s gonna be like an inverse design, because
the areas in which the olives don’t
touch, will look like the dragon.

While I’m making the pizza, you don’t
want any cheese to show!

All red, red and black like dragon, and green,
and well, 1 white, but yeah…

Da-da! Got all the pepperonis on there, and
then just like the deer, you’re gonna

like, grate, like, just cut these little olives
really, really small pieces.

And then, position them on the cake to look
like… Dragon!

Then you just position all the olives, this
isn’t perfect, but,
this is just gonna have to do!

Here you go, there we go, there we doe! There
we doe.

Boom! House Targaryen! And now, last and definitely
least, House Lannister!

I’m gonna be making a pepperoni, lion…
Pizza!

First I’m gonna line the pizza, get the
outline going. Oop! Move over!

And then I’ll cut out the shape of the lion
into the pepperonis and then
put it on.

So I just cut out the shape of the lion into
a bunch of pepperonis that I

laid out, after I put all the pepperonis on
the pizza. And now I’m just
going to transfer them over.
Boom! House Lannister!

They’re all done! Now it’s time to bake
these puppies!
